channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiAnalyzer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiAnalyzer

item.title: CVE-2024-45330|2024-10-08T14:19:03.894Z -- fortinet -- fortianalyzer
item.description: A use of externally-controlled format string in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer versions 7.4.0 through 7.4.3, 7.2.2 through 7.2.5 allows attacker to escalate its privileges via specially crafted requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-44254|2024-09-10T14:37:45.294Z -- fortinet -- fortianalyzer
item.description: An authorization bypass through user-controlled key [CWE-639] vulnerability in FortiAnalyzer version 7.4.1 and before 7.2.5 and FortiManager version 7.4.1 and before 7.2.5 may allow a remote attacker with low privileges to read sensitive data via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2023-44254|2024-09-10T17:13:19.223Z -- fortinet -- fortianalyzer
item.description: An authorization bypass through user-controlled key [CWE-639] vulnerability in FortiAnalyzer version 7.4.1 and before 7.2.5 and FortiManager version 7.4.1 and before 7.2.5 may allow a remote attacker with low privileges to read sensitive data via a crafted HTTP request.
